message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $9,500. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. I'm willing to offer $8,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is quite valuable to me.  I could meet you halfway at $9,000.  This is my final offer.
